column1: Local Foods////Their crunchy chicken is one of the best sandwiches I've ever had
column2: for sure!  I was expecting a chicken tender on a pretzel bun
column3: but instead I was treated to a pretzel bun with thickly sliced chicken that had been encrusted in nuts
column7: drizzled with the perfect amount of buttermilk ranch.  I loved the crunch the potato chips lent the sandwich...fantastic!
